title: StarTalk Live! Storms of Our Century (Part 2)
description: The climate heats up in the Bell House when Neil deGrasse Tyson and the StarTalk Live crew, including Questlove and Dr. Adam Sobel, look at the causes, politics and science of climate change.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
content:encoded: The climate heats up in the Bell House when Neil deGrasse Tyson and the StarTalk Live crew, including Questlove and Dr. Adam Sobel, look at the causes, politics and science of climate change.
